Reviews.Title: Video quality degrades bad with these long cables...
Reviews.Author: Firefighter "Blu-Ray addict"
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if it's the quality of the cables or the length of them but the cameras I used these on have very noticable worse quality then the 60' ones that came with my system.  If you can get by with 100' go with those and maybe it won't be bad but my logic was they were only a couple of dollars more then the 100' ones so I bought them but wish I had gotten the 100'.  I'm not about to change them out now but for you future buyers, you need to know.  The longer the cable, the worse the signal.  Wish I had known before just how bad the signal would be.  I compared a 25', 60' and 150' cable and it's very noticable.  The 25' ones are much clearer.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I recommended For every oneThe price is very good
